data.title: FBO & Ground Handler in Santiago, Chile (SCEL) Airport Handling Service
data.meta_description: FBO Ground Handlers in Santiago, Chile (SCEL). Universal Aviation is here to support your next mission. Request a quote or call.

Arturo Merino Benítez International Airport / Santiago International Airport / Nuevo Pudahuel Airport · Santiago

Nestled in the shadows of the majestic Andes Mountains, and conveniently located at Arturo Merion Benitez International Airport, we’re an ideal central hub to anywhere you need to be in Chile.

This ground handler is a Universal Aviation Certified network member

Some Great Reasons to Choose Us

As a Universal Aviation Certified member, FBO Aviasur’s highly-trained team adheres to all Universal Aviation safety, customer service, and regulatory compliance standards.

Our large team is multilingual (English, German, Russian, Spanish) and capable of handling all types of operations.

We always have a minimum of three wing walkers and one marshal, and our vehicles are brand new and allowed to access all internal airport areas.
